post.body: wrong. hee hee hee ok, our PS has just finished it's millionth update and appears ready to go <watch this space>

HOLY SHIT! CONGRATS! The new year is looking up!
I like to think I'm mindful of the environment - if we all did 1 thing it would be better, that 1 thing is up to the person.
M&M - I couldn't imagine life without meat. If the LORD had wanted us to be veggie's he wouldn't have made meat so tasty!
Um... no! :) It works well for Jan, as Australia Day happens as well. I need to start working on February's theme.
the original artist did it that way. I'd say it's done for "artistic" purposes.

you're nuts - but in a good way :)
